title: 26 wins 32 losses, still in placements?
body: i am meant to be on my silver promos but after updating patch 6.8 its saying and showing i am in my placements again, will my next win get me to silver or bug out and do nothing? anyone else having this problem?

replies.body:
Hey,

This happened to me as well, after updating to patch 6.8

I was Gold V ~50 LP and now it is saying I am unranked and in Placements. It's obviously a bug, I suggest not playing any ranked games until it gets sorted out. I'm just sticking to normals for now, as painful as that is.
